page.title: 20ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND
page.content: We had a field at the top of the villagewhich was supposed to be used for games and things. But it was never used because the grass was too long and anyhow, there was nothing there to play with. So some of us asked our parents to do something about it and first of all they asked the Parish Council if they would get the grass cut They did and they also put in goal posts and marked out a football pitch.Then we thought it would be a good idea to have an adventure playground. Lots of us did a sponsored walk to raise money and now we've got an adventure playgroundwhere we can go and play. there still isn't enoughso we are hoping to raise some more money to buy some more things and then it will be the best in the area..
